aboutMe: As a computer engineer with a background in embedded systems and machine learning. I have experience in the design and development of computer systems and hardware, as well as a strong understanding of programming languages. In addition to my work in computer engineering, I have also gained experience in web development using the ReactJS framework. I am proficient in building high-performance web applications that can run on a variety of devices.
